title: Conair Gel Grips Xl Thermal Round Brush, Colors May Vary
description: Conair gel grips extra large thermal round brush has a soft gel handle that conforms to the shape of your hand for more control. the vented inner core distributes heat evenly for faster drying without overdrying and frizz. large round barrel to straighten coarse wavy hair or add soft curls and volume. achieve roller style waves without the hassle of setting.

title: Maybelline New York The Falsies Volum' Express Washable Mascara, Blackest Black, 0.25 Fluid Ounce
description: It's not mascara, it's false lash glam in a tube, instantly  patented spoon brush and pro keratin fiber formula instantly build 8x more volume without clumping. Unique flexible wand helps lift and separate, to provide the look of 3x more lashes. You will find lashes you didn't even know you had. To safeguard maybelline(r) purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. if change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritate, or infected. consult a physician promptly.

title: NYX Cosmetics Eyebrow Marker, EBM01
description: Long-lasting eyebrow marker. Precision application tip creates thin, thick or natural looking brows. Does not smear on smudge. Available in medium and deep shades.

title: Olay Oil Minimizing Toner, 7.20-Ounce (Pack of 2)
description: Removes oil, dirt and make-up without stripping skin of its essential moisture.

title: Alterna Bamboo Shine Luminous Shine Mist for Unisex, 4 Ounce
description: Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist - 4 oz. (100ml) Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist instantly adds polish and brilliant shine to any hair type. Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist's weightless finishing mist polishes any hair type with sheer, mirror-like shine. Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist eliminates frizz and flyaways. Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist contains Color Hold technology to provide color retention. Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist is safe for color treated hair. Alterna Bamboo Luminous Shine Mist contains: NO Parabens NO Sulfates NO Phthalates NO Synthetic Color NO Gluten NO Mineral Oil NO Petrolatum Bamboo ShineIlluminate dull hair with shine enhancing Organic Indian Gooseberry. also formulated with Organic Bamboo Extract for a strengthening foundation. The Alterna Promise: Transformation... After Just One Use.Since 1997, Alterna has pioneered luxury haircare. Whatever your haircare need, they believe that you shouldn't have to choose between clinically-proven, salon-tested results & natural, good-for-you ingredients. That's why their products are: Pure. Proven. Professional. PureCaviar, Seasilk, Bamboo, Kendi Oil & morethese precious, sustainable ingredients deliver pure, powerful benefits. And what they leave out of their products is just as important as what they put in. They believe beauty products should be FREE OF Parabens, Sulfates, Phthalates & other harsh or unnecessary additives. So important to them, this FREE OF claim appears on the front of every Alterna bottle, along with their commitment to eco-friendly packaging & fair-trade practices. ProvenThey believe that consumers deserve high-performance products that deliver on their promises. That's why they have spent over 15 years developing proprietary technologies subjected to intensive clinical, consumer, safety and in-salon testing.

title: Alterna Bamboo Smooth Anti-Breakage Thermal Protectant Spray for Unisex, 4.2 Ounce
description: Bend, No BreakThese days, your hair goes through more than just a simple wash, cut and style routine. With all the heat-based prep work that goes into achieving the perfect coif, your lovely locks need the kind of protection that will maintain perfection. Turn to Alterna Bamboo Smooth's new Anti-breakage Thermal Protectant Spray for healthy and smooth hair.Protects from high heatStrengthens and smoothsRepairsBamboo Smooth Anti-Breakage Thermal Protectant Spray is clinically proven to reduce breakage by 87%, instantly repairing and strengthening hair and smoothing strands while providing maximum anti-breakage protection from heat styling tools. With an exceptionally high level of thermal protection of up to 428, hair is repaired and replenished and thoroughly protected inside and out.Especially suited for:All Skin TypesEssential elements:Alterna Bamboo Smooth's anti-breakage spray contains organic bamboo extract, kendi oil, water, fragrance, glycerin and more.Weight:4.2 oz.Special Shipping Information: This product may not be available for 1 or 2 day shipping due to federal regulations that require it to ship via ground ship methods only. This product can only be shipped within the 48 contiguous states.

title: Renpure Solutions  Cleansing Conditioner, Sweet Pomegranate, 16 Fluid Ounce
description: Most damage to hair occurs during shampooing, rubbing your hair causes the damaged areas to crack and tear. This miracle cleansing conditioner melts into your hair. Coconut oil gently removes surface impurities while restoring natural oils. Hydrating Keratin loaded with amino acids and protein repair damage and restore strength. Shea butter conditions damaged areas replacing protective lipids, resulting in beautiful, soft, silky hair alive with shine and luster.
